Title: ColorPickerControl
Description:
Yet another Color Picker Control to demonstrate a simple way to implement a color picker.
This project contains two controls:
1. ColorPickerControl - a UserControl that show all available color buttons for user to choose
2. ColorPickerComboBox - a ComboBox that is restyled to show a ColorPickerControl in the dropdown
